trans-unit.source: Provides static methods used to draw user interface elements on activity designer surfaces.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos estáticos usados para desenhar os elementos da interface do usuário nas superfícies de designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra uma maneira de usar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe para desenhar uma atividade personalizada na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo arredondado é desenhado primeiro usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Texto, em seguida, é desenhado usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e é colocado no local do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> método o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, um botão de expansão usado por um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the 3-dimensional button.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar o botão tridimensional.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw on the button.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser desenhado no botão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites do botão.

trans-unit.source: The single-precision floating-point number to specify the transparency level of the button.
trans-unit.target: O número de ponto flutuante de precisão simples para especificar o nível de transparência do botão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState" /> enumeration value to specify the appearance of the button.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState" /> para especificar a aparência do botão.

trans-unit.source: Draws a 3-dimensional button on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um botão tridimensional na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the button.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar o botão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the button.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites do botão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw an expanded button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para desenhar um botão expandido, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> associated with the activity designer used to render the button.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> associado ao designer de atividade usado para renderizar o botão.

trans-unit.source: Draws a button that is used to expand and collapse composite designers on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um botão que é usado para expandir e recolher os designers de composição na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra uma maneira de usar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe para desenhar uma atividade personalizada na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo arredondado é desenhado primeiro usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Texto, em seguida, é desenhado usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e é colocado no local do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> método o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, um botão de expansão usado por um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> or <paramref name="compositeDesignerTheme" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> ou <paramref name="compositeDesignerTheme" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Draws an image on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma imagem na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the image to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites da imagem a ser desenhada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> that specifies how the image is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> que especifica como a imagem é alinhada no retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: Draws an image on the activity designer surface by using a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, and a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" />.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma imagem na superfície do designer de atividade usando um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, uma <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> e um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" />.

trans-unit.source: When you use this version of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A>, the source rectangle is set to the size, in pixels, of the image, the transparency setting is set to 1.0f, and drawing grayscales is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa esta versão do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A>, o retângulo de origem é definido como o tamanho, em pixels, da imagem, a configuração de transparência é definida como 1, 0F e escalas de cinza de desenho não é permitido.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra uma maneira de usar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe para desenhar uma atividade personalizada na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo arredondado é desenhado primeiro usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Texto, em seguida, é desenhado usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e é colocado no local do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> método o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, um botão de expansão usado por um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="image" />, or <paramref name="destination" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="image" /> ou <paramref name="destination" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the image.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar a imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the image.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites da imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the source of the image.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define a fonte da imagem.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> that specifies how the image is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> que especifica como a imagem é alinhada no retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: A single-precision floating-point number that defines the transparency settings for the image.
trans-unit.target: Um número de ponto flutuante de precisão simples que define as configurações de transparência da imagem.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to draw the image in grayscales; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para desenhar a imagem em escalas de cinza, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Draws an image on the activity designer surface by using a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, an <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, a source and destination <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />, an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" />, a single-precision floating-point number, and a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: Desenha uma imagem na superfície do designer de atividade usando um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, uma <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />, um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> de origem e de destino, um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" />, um número de ponto flutuante de precisão simples e um valor booliano.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="image" />, <paramref name="destination" />, or <paramref name="source" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="image" />, <paramref name="destination" /> ou <paramref name="source" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="transparency" /> is less than 0, or greater than 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="transparency" /> é menor que 0 ou maior que 1.0f.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar o retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> to draw the rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> para desenhar o retângulo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the rounded rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define os limites do retângulo arredondado.

trans-unit.source: The integer value of the radius to use for the rounded edges.
trans-unit.target: O valor inteiro do raio a ser usado para bordas arredondadas.

trans-unit.source: Draws a rounded rectangle on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um retângulo arredondado na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> uses the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> method to obtain the path to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> usa o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> método para obter o caminho para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra uma maneira de usar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe para desenhar uma atividade personalizada na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo arredondado é desenhado primeiro usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Texto, em seguida, é desenhado usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e é colocado no local do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> método o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, um botão de expansão usado por um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> or <paramref name="drawingPen" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> ou <paramref name="drawingPen" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> no qual desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> used to draw the text
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> usado para desenhar o texto

trans-unit.source: The text to draw.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which the text must be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitador em que o texto deve ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringAlignment" /> that specifies where the text is aligned in the bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.StringAlignment" /> que especifica onde o texto é alinhado no retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality" /> that specifies the quality setting to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TextQuality" /> que especifica a configuração de qualidade para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> to draw the text.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> para desenhar o texto.

trans-unit.source: Draws text on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Desenha texto na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a way to use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class to draw a custom activity on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra uma maneira de usar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe para desenhar uma atividade personalizada na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A rounded rectangle is first drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Um retângulo arredondado é desenhado primeiro usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Text is then drawn using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> and is placed at the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Texto, em seguida, é desenhado usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawText%2A> e é colocado no local do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.TextRectangle%2A> do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> class.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Image%2A> associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawImage%2A> método o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint> classe.

trans-unit.source: Finally, an expand button used by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> is drawn using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, um botão de expansão usado por um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> é desenhado usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawExpandButton%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="font" />, <paramref name="text" />, or <paramref name="textBrush" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" />, <paramref name="font" />, <paramref name="text" /> ou <paramref name="textBrush" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> for which to obtain the graphics path.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> para o qual obter o caminho de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: An integer that defines the radius to use to draw the rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que define o raio a ser usado para desenhar os cantos arredondados.

trans-unit.source: Returns the graphics path used to draw the specified rounded rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o caminho de gráficos usado para desenhar o retângulo arredondado especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> that draws the rounded path of the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath" /> que desenha o caminho arredondado do retângulo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> method uses <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> to obtain the path to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.DrawRoundedRectangle%2A> método usa <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaint.GetRoundedRectanglePath%2A> para obter o caminho para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rectangle" /> is set to <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rectangle" /> é definido como <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Rectangle.IsEmpty" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="radius" /> is less than or equal to 0.
